header.title: Ganacsi yar waxa koriya agab tayo le.
header.subtitle: Maxaa Flex ka dhigaya mid cad oo sahlan?
header.mintext: Ganacsi yar wuxuu la egyahay kaliya tayada agabkiisa.

join_section.title: Ku biir in ka badan 6000 shirkadood oo koraya Flex
description: Present varius justo vel justo pulvinar

features_section.title: Hel aragti dheeraad ah sida dadku u isticmaalaan alaabtaada
features_section.description: Isticmaal awoodaha Flex si aad u falanqeyso mashruucyada, iskaashi, iyo qorsheyn.

pricing_section.title: Qorshe qiimeyn dabacsan oo ku habboon shirkaddaada
pricing_section.description: Dooro qorshaha ku habboon baahidaada ganacsi

team_section.title: La kulan kooxda
team_section.description: Kooxdayada xirfadlayaasha ah waxay awood u leeyihiin inay maareeyaan ganacsigaaga dhammaan kanaalada dijitaalka ah.

join_team_section.title: Ku biir kooxda
join_team_section.description: Had iyo jeer waxaan raadineynaa dad karti leh si ay ugu biiraan kooxda.
